We had the opportunity to discuss all our relations, the Cyprus issue, the Euro-Turkish relations & the developments in our region.
Our positive agenda is being developed in areas of strategic importance, both for Greece and Turkey, as well as for the wider region.
We are speeding up the implementation of decisions we took in the Supreme Cooperation Council in Smyrna for transport, energy, investment & tourism.
Greece supports Turkey's accession course, which can help resolve issues & promote further co-operation.
Implementation of our agenda must be based on good neighborly relations & mutual respect without actions that undermine them.
A just and viable solution to the Cyprus problem is becoming increasingly imperative, given the destabilization of our region.
